Source.Name: libltc
Source.Summary: libLTC provides functionality to encode and decode LTC audio from/to SMPTE or EBU timecode, including SMPTE date support.
Source.Description: libLTC provides functionality to encode and decode LTC audio from/to SMPTE or EBU timecode, including SMPTE date support. Linear (or Longitudinal) Timecode (LTC) is an encoding of SMPTE timecode data as a Manchester-Biphase encoded audio signal. The audio signal is commonly recorded on a VTR track or other storage media.
